import "./App.css"; import { useState } from "react"; import { get, search, update } from "./BooksAPI"; import "./components/Books/book.css"; import Book from "./components/Books/Book"; import BookShelfChanger from "./components/BookShelfChanger"; function App() { const [showSearchPage, setShowSearchpage] = useState(false); const [searchValue, setSearchValue] = useState(""); const [searchResult, setSearchResult] = useState([]); // const [chooseShelf, SetChooseShelf] = useState([]); const handleChange = async (event) => { event.preventDefault(); setSearchValue(event.target.value); let result = await search(event.target.value); setSearchResult(result); }; // const changeShelf = async (event, id) => { // event.preventDefault(); // SetChooseShelf(event.target.value); // const chooseBook = searchResult.map((search) => search.id === id); // const updateShelf = await update(chooseBook, chooseShelf); // console.log("update shelf", updateShelf); // }; return (
{showSearchPage ? (
setShowSearchpage(!showSearchPage)} > Close
    {searchResult.map((result, id) => { return (
  1. {result.title}
    {result.authors.map((author) => author)}
    2. ); })}
) : (

MyReads

Currently Reading

;
  1. To Kill a Mockingbird
    Harper Lee
  2. Ender's Game
    Orson Scott Card

Read

;

    J.R.R. Tolkien

    Seuss

    Mark Twain
setShowSearchpage(!showSearchPage)}>Add a book
)}
); } export default App;
